snippet.title: ELEX II - Explanation Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome back to Magalan, where ravenous wildlife threatens your every move and warring factions are constantly at each other’s throats. To survive in this huge, open world, you will need to regain your powers.  Learn to use the secrets of Magalan to your advantage and you might just be able to save this planet… We are counting on you.

ELEX II is coming March 1, 2022 to PC, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series S|X and Xbox One.

- Pre-Order here -
Steam: https://thqn.net/elex2-steam
PlayStation: https://thqn.net/elex2-ps
Xbox: https://thqn.net/elex2-xbox

- Links & Info -
Website: https://elexgame.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/elex

- Our Socials -
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/THQNordic
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Elex_Game
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/elexgame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thqnordic
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/thqnordic

#ELEX #PiranhaBytes
